original_title: หวานมันส์ ฉันคือเธอ
overview: An accident makes Deuan and Ton switch their bodies: Ton from an athletic young man to a gentle, clean and intelligence person and Deuan, a clean, neat and smart person, to a tough and very gutsy person. Their friends begin to suspect about their behavior.
tagline: I am you… you are me.
title: U & ME
